creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
description: apron panel of white, yellow and black cross-stitch geometric and floral patterns on red; blue backing; three bells on back at bottom; two pairs of long ties with geometric embroidery on red with blue backing; two rows of white seeds or beans at bottom as fringe
dimension: 18 9/16 x 13 15/16 in. (47.15 x 35.4 cm) (without seed fringe or ties)
title: Man's Apron
